newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Port conditions update - Pakistan - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Pakistan - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
PAKISTAN, July 23 - Karachi - Vessels waiting off port, one general cargo waiting for one day, and one oil tanker waiting for two days. Two vessels waiting off port for own reasons.
